tag.name: modal

attribute.description: Indicates the size of modal. Default none. Options: xl,sm,lg
attribute.name: size

attribute.description: Indicates the modal id for direct manipulation of events
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: Indicates the component name that triggers the modal screen
attribute.name: attachTo

attribute.description: Indicates the component selector that triggers the modal screen
attribute.name: attachToSelector

attribute.description: Indicates if modal can be closeable. Default : true. Options : true,false
attribute.name: closeable

attribute.description: Indicates if modal is vertically centered. Default : false. Options : true,false
attribute.name: centered

attribute.description: Indicates if component is opened on load. Default : false. Options : true,false
attribute.name: open

attribute.description: It indicates whether the component should be rendered
attribute.name: rendered

tag.example:
<html:buttonGroup> <html:button label="My button" icon="search" id="btn1" /> </html:buttonGroup>
<html:modal attachToSelector="#btn1"> <html:modalHeader label="My modal title"></html:modalHeader> <html:modalBody> Here is my component </html:modalBody> <html:modalFooter> My footer </html:modalFooter> </html:modal>

tag.name: modalHeader

attribute.description: Indicates the label of the modal header
attribute.name: label

attribute.description: Indicates the label key (i18n) of the modal header
attribute.name: labelKey

tag.example:
<html:buttonGroup> <html:button label="My button" icon="search" id="btn1" /> </html:buttonGroup>
<html:modal attachToSelector="#btn1"> <html:modalHeader label="My modal title"></html:modalHeader> <html:modalBody> Here is my component </html:modalBody> <html:modalFooter> My footer </html:modalFooter> </html:modal>

tag.name: modalFooter

attribute.description: It indicates whether the component should be rendered . Default : true
attribute.name: rendered

tag.example:
<html:buttonGroup> <html:button label="My button" icon="search" id="btn1" /> </html:buttonGroup>
<html:modal attachToSelector="#btn1"> <html:modalHeader label="My modal title"></html:modalHeader> <html:modalBody> Here is my component </html:modalBody> <html:modalFooter> My footer </html:modalFooter> </html:modal>
